"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"usersNftStaked","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"addCollection(address,uint256)":{"details":"Add a new NFT collection to the staking contract. This allows for adding new collections after deployment."},"balanceOf(address,address)":{"details":"Returns how many tokens a user staked in a specific collection."},"earned(address,address)":{"details":"Returns the total unclaimed reward for `account` on a specific collection."},"emergencyWithdraw(address)":{"details":"Emergency withdraw NFTs without claiming rewards. This function is intended for use in emergency situations where users need to retrieve their NFTs quickly, bypassing reward calculations.  This improved version handles potential transfer failures more gracefully."},"getReward()":{"details":"Claim all accumulated rewards from all collections for the caller. Uses a more secure approach to prevent potential reentrancy and ensure accurate reward calculations."},"getRewardForDuration()":{"details":"Return how many tokens would be distributed across `rewardsDuration` at the current rate."},"getUserStakedNftIds(address)":{"details":"Returns the token IDs that the caller has staked in a specific collection."},"lastTimeRewardApplicable()":{"details":"The last time at which rewards should be calculated (blocks at periodFinish)."},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Required implementation for ERC721 receiver interface. This allows the contract to receive ERC721 tokens."},"pause()":{"details":"Pause the contract, preventing new stakes."},"recoverERC20(address,uint256)":{"details":"Recover ERC20 tokens sent to the contract by mistake. This function can ONLY be called by the designated recovery wallet, not by the owner/deployer. This protects users from potential rug pulls.  The function ensures that reward tokens can only be recovered if they exceed the amount needed for current reward distribution."},"removeCollection(address)":{"details":"Remove a collection from the allowed list. This prevents new stakes but allows unstaking and reward claiming."},"rewardPerToken(address)":{"details":"Return the \"reward per token staked\" for a given collection. Uses high precision calculations to avoid rounding errors."},"setRewardAmount(uint256)":{"details":"Set the reward amount for the next reward period. This function updates the reward rate and extends the reward period.  Improved to handle precision issues and ensure secure token transfers."},"setRewardsDuration(uint256)":{"details":"Set the duration for reward distribution. This can only be called after the current reward period has finished."},"stake(address,uint256[])":{"details":"Stake multiple NFTs from a specific collection."},"totalEarned(address)":{"details":"Returns the total unclaimed rewards across all collections for an account."},"unStake(address,uint256[])":{"details":"Unstake multiple NFTs from a collection. Allows partial unstake."},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpause the contract, allowing stakes again."},"updateCollectionRatio(address,uint256)":{"details":"Update the ratio for an existing collection. This allows for adjusting reward distribution between collections."}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"RoofinanceSecure.sol":"RooFinanceSecure"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"RoofinanceSecure.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7f3ef38196b280f4336542f5bb3dd651bfb6556f77488b78f3b5403fdd0d529a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4dc4934bd84586e93d98c35b5ef2d87ca6080fd147f01f257f98a0d1036ba183","dweb:/ipfs/QmfV5gyamsAtKksWoU3iLrep8uj8qkwcEteWuTrUu1wSCg"]}},"version":1}
